_comment: Claude Code Audio Hooks - Default Configuration Template
_description: This file contains the default configuration for Claude Code Audio Hooks. Copy this to user_preferences.json and customize as needed.

enabled_hooks._comment_notification: Plays when Claude needs authorization or plan confirmation - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
enabled_hooks._comment_stop: Plays when Claude finishes responding - RECOMMENDED
enabled_hooks._comment_pretooluse: Plays before Claude executes a tool (can be noisy) - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_posttooluse: Plays after each tool execution (very noisy) - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_userpromptsubmit: Plays when you submit a prompt - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_subagent_stop: Plays when subagent tasks complete - RECOMMENDED for heavy users
enabled_hooks._comment_precompact: Plays before conversation history compaction - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_session_start: Plays when Claude Code session starts - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_session_end: Plays when Claude Code session ends - OPTIONAL

audio_files._comment: Paths relative to audio/ directory. Use 'default/' for built-in files or 'custom/' for your own.

playback_settings._comment_queue: Enable audio queue to prevent overlapping sounds
playback_settings._comment_max_queue: Maximum number of audio notifications in queue
playback_settings._comment_debounce: Minimum milliseconds between same notification type (prevents spam)

_usage_notes: 2. Enable 'pretooluse' only if you want notifications before EVERY tool execution
3. 'posttooluse' is very noisy - enable only for debugging
4. To disable a notification, set its value to false in enabled_hooks
5. To use custom audio, place MP3 files in audio/custom/ and update paths
6. Audio files should be 1-3 seconds long for best experience
8. Run 'scripts/test-audio.sh' to test all enabled notifications
